rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0001
rows.name:
The people in Trigo are so kind.
They're making places to live for all
these people who suddenly showed up!

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Normally if outsiders come into your
territory, that's the cue for a fight.

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Turf wars are such a pain, though.
Personally I'd probably just give
up and leave.

rows.label: tlk42350122_04_msg0004
rows.name:
But in Trigo, it looks like everyone
will be getting along well pretty soon!
